{{user.name}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../REGapi/models'; import { Service } from '../REGapi/services'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reglog', templateUrl: './reglog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reglog.component.css'] }) export class ReglogComponent { users : User[] = []; constructor(private serv : Service){} ngOnInit(): void { this.get(); } get(){ this.serv.getAllUsers().subscribe((us) => { this.users = us; }); } name :string = ''; mail :string =''; pas : string = ''; reg(){ let curr:User = { name :this.name , login : this.mail, password : this.pas }; console.log(curr); this.name = ''; this.mail =''; this.pas = ''; this.serv.addUs({body:curr}); this.get(); } log(){ let curr:User = { name :this.name , login : this.mail, password : this.pas }; console.log(curr); this.name = ''; this.mail =''; this.pas = ''; } }
